Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text:
Available 1/1/2022 - Reception, large and small conference room, seven offices, break room, IT room, storage and open space for work
stations. Divisible to 2,400 RSF.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
•    Amenity rich environment with multiple restaurants, a hotel and retail within walking distance 
•    Immediately adjacent to Chino Valley (71) Freeway off Central Avenue with easy access to both the Pomona (60) and Riverside (91) Freeways

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
•    Four building Class A project centrally located in Chino Hills 
•    First class materials utilized for construction including highly upgraded exterior improvements, common area, tenant improvements and landscaping/site work 
•    Above standard parking available up to 6 per 1,000 RSF to accommodate above standard office and medical users 
•    Building top freeway and major monument signage available
